claim: barry rfc be the only team with more than 1 game drawn through 20 game
resp:

   1. Identify the total number of games played by each team. All teams have played 20 games (as per rows 2-12).
   2. Identify which teams have drawn a game or more. In this case, Barry RFC has drawn 2 games (row 4), and Hirwaun RFC has also drawn 1 game (row 7).
   3. Compare the number of games drawn by each team. Only Barry RFC (with 2 drawn games) has more than 1 game drawn among all teams.
   4. Check if there are any other teams with exactly 1 drawn game. In this case, Hirwaun RFC is the only other team with 1 drawn game.
   5. Based on the comparison, Barry RFC is the only team that meets the condition of having more than 1 game drawn through 20 games.
